page.title: 17Housing in Whitburn
page.content:
This is less than 20 years old.Close by there are bungalows mainly for pensioners at Robinson Gardens. Around Central Avenue there are semi -detached houses over 2O years old.This was a council estate but recently many have been sold to the residents. There are two recent housing developments.Near Souter View private housing is being built.27 bungalows are going to be built at the north end of the village. Modern detached executive style houses can be found in the Nicholas Avenue area.
.
